mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table ( userId, ord_stat, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{ord_stat}, #{delivery_fee}, #{total_prod_pric}, #{total_bene_pric}, #{total_ord_pric}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{up_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT ord_seq, ord_stat, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id, userId FROM order_table WHERE ord_seq = #{ord_seq};
mapper.update: UPDATE order_table SET ord_stat = #{ord_stat}, delivery_fee = #{delivery_fee}, total_prod_pric = #{total_prod_pric}, total_bene_pric = #{total_bene_pric}, total_ord_pric = #{total_ord_pric}, up_date = now(), up_id = #{up_id} WHERE ord_seq = #{ord_seq}
